title: Emerald and Pearl Delicate Diamond Haaram - Manohar's Timeless Elegance
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A delicate diamond haaram featuring a center pendant with intricate filigree work. The pendant showcases a vibrant pear-shaped emerald surrounded by shimmering diamonds. Lustrous freshwater pearls are suspended from the pendant, adding a touch of traditional grace. The necklace chain is meticulously crafted with small diamond drop pendants.
colors: accentuated by the lush green of the emerald and the creamy white of the pearls. The yellow gold adds warmth and richness to the design.
occasions: cocktail parties and daily wear. Also perfect as a light weight haaram for Seemantham (baby shower) or other traditional family functions.
description: This diamond haaram offers a blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern, lightweight design. The high-quality diamonds and vibrant emerald create a captivating sparkle, while the freshwater pearls add a touch of classic elegance. Expert Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees durability and lasting beauty. A perfect piece for those who appreciate both tradition and contemporary style.
